commentBody: The article should have mentioned the Grizzlies In addition to retaining the league's most underrated point guard, Mike Conley, Memphis  acquired one of the league's best perimeter shooters, Chandler Parsons, who came back from his knee surgery with a fantastic post-All Star run. If Marc Gasol returns to top form, Memphis will have one of the best starting lineups in the league. It's not hard to see them getting to second seed.
